title: Powers of surviving personal representative
context: ยง560:3-718 Powers of surviving personal representative. Unless the terms of the will otherwise provide, every power exercisable by personal co-representatives may be exercised by the one or more remaining after the appointment of one or more is terminated, and if one of two or more nominated as co-executors is not appointed, those appointed may exercise all the powers incident to the office. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
